title: Is it allowed to write biographies of famous dead people? - Quora

response.answer_text: With exceptions that may pertain to limited cases in limited nations, yes, you can write about anyone you wish to. Some exceptions that are important to consider is the political framework of any country that you are residing in. For example, if you live in a nation with a Muslim government, you may wish to take caution in what you might write about Mohammed. Or if you lived in a nation such as Thailand, you might want to be very careful what you wrote about a past king.
